CustomField.description: The interval between the repeating value. For example, a Monthly setting with a frequency of 2 means 'every 2 months', while a Daily setting with a frequency of 45 means 'every 45 days'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The interval between the repeating value. For example, a Monthly setting with a frequency of 2 means 'every 2 months', while a Daily setting with a frequency of 45 means 'every 45 days'.
CustomField.label: Frequency
